aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.firstText:
Hello, my name is
Alejandro Suárez
aboutMe.secondText:
I've been a
software developer
since 2018 and graduated from the
University of Guadalajara
with a degree in
Computer Engineering
aboutMe.thirdText:
I have more than three years of work experience using
React
,
Tailwind
,
Node.js
and
TypeScript
aboutMe.fourthText:
I also have experience using tools like
Unity Engine
,
React Native
,
Git
,
MySQL
and
C#

xRayExplorerVR.description: VR application focused in learning about the human skeleton.

enLosOjosDeTlachy.description:
Puzzle and adventure videogame set in a isometric 2.5D world, in which you can play as a tlacuache that searches ways to avoid the challenges that their reality presents.

This game was submitted to a game jam organized by Latin America Games Showcase.

webpConverter.description: Desktop tool that allows the user to convert images to .webp and other formats such as .jpg, .png and .bmp.

proyectosYRefrigeracion.description: Official webpage for Refrigeración y Proyectos S.A. de C.V.

medalOfDarkness.description: Puzzle videogame for teenagers in order to help and improve the reading comprehension and logic reasoning.

footer.compiledBy: Compiled and published with Netlify
